EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for signing-up for the Pivotal | Dell EMC Transforming Big Data and Applications Roadshow.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/transforming-big-data-and-applications-roadshow/frankfurt]]>
